entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
